verbs.description: WASHINGTON -- President Donald Trump , still nursing resentment against [ARG0: Attorney General Jeff Sessions] for [V: recusing] [ARG1: himself] [ARG2: from the Russia investigation] , said he wishes he had picked a different leader of the Justice Department .
